Reviews: It had some laughs, but overall the motivation of the characters was incomprehensible. Why should they be mad at men for cheating when they sleep with all sorts of married men themselves? Very hypocritical. Their lives are messed up because they messed them up with stupid choices. I had no empathy for any of these women.
Resenhas: Riu algumas risadas, mas no geral a motiva챌찾o dos personagens era incompreens챠vel. Por que eles deveriam ficar bravos com os homens por trair quando dormem com todo tipo de homem casado? Muito hip처crita. Suas vidas est찾o bagun챌adas porque as bagun챌aram com escolhas est첬pidas. Eu n찾o tinha empatia por nenhuma dessas mulheres.
Description: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

Reviews: WAITING TO EXHALE Waiting, and waiting, and waiting, and waiting... you get the point. "Waiting To Exhale", Forrest Whitaker's take on Terry McMillan's popular book, had a rather popular following upon it's release in 1995. It was packaged brilliantly, crossing over into the popular music scene with a blockbuster soundtrack featuring it's star Whitney Houston. However, as Leonard Maltin said it so beautifully, this film ultimately reminds one too much of the easy listening jazz that plays under nearly every scene."Waiting To Exhale" had the potential to be an interesting movie. It features a nice ensemble that manages to have good chemistry while also allowing certain performers to step into the limelight and really dominate certain scenes. Unfortunately, in the end, the movie is a repetitive drone.It tells the story of four African-American females (played by Angela Bassett, Whitney Houston, Loretta Divine, and Lela Rochon) as they struggle to find the men in life that can satisfy there needs. The only problem, in the world of this movie, men are nothing but complete ass-holes who wouldn't know the word "feelings" if they looked it up in the dictionary. How can this film possibly go anywhere when it's screenwriters has made men so incredibly unredeemable that nothing can change.For the first 45 minutes, the film is slightly enjoyable. However, as it continues on into it's 2 hour and plus running time... it begins to feel like deja-vu. The women keep putting themselves in identical situations to those they've experienced in the past... and as much as they talk about it in slow/sultry voice-overs, they don't seem to learn squat.It's like the soundtrack music. Slightly soothing, enjoyable, and easy to digest... but too slow and pointless to listen to for very long. "Waiting To Exhale" in the end is nothing more then a boringly pointless film that wastes the potential it had with the cast. Were the film given more of a focal point, and a more distinct narrative line, perhaps it could have been a good film. But everyone on board apparently missed the memo that... films are better when they have a plot and a purpose.... D ...

Como esse filme pode ir a qualquer lugar quando seus roteiristas tornaram os homens t찾o incrivelmente irrecuper찼veis ?뗢땞ue nada pode mudar. Nos primeiros 45 minutos, o filme 챕 um pouco agrad찼vel. No entanto, 횪 medida que continua em duas horas e mais o tempo de execu챌찾o ... come챌a a parecer um d챕j횪-vu. As mulheres continuam se colocando em situa챌천es id챗nticas 횪s que experimentaram no passado ... e, por mais que falem sobre isso em dublagens lentas / sensuais, elas parecem n찾o aprender a agachar-se. . Um pouco suave, agrad찼vel e f찼cil de digerir ... mas muito lento e sem sentido para ouvir por muito tempo. "Waiting To Exhale" no final n찾o 챕 nada al챕m de um filme chato e sem sentido que desperdi챌a o potencial que ele tinha com o elenco. Se o filme tivesse mais um ponto focal e uma linha narrativa mais distinta, talvez pudesse ter sido um bom filme. Mas todo mundo a bordo aparentemente perdeu o memorando de que ... os filmes s찾o melhores quando t챗m um enredo e um objetivo ... D ...

Reviews: The movie is okay, mediocre might even be the word to describe it. I have to say that you can really tell who can act and who can't. I mean the normal amount is good.. but this is too much.. I don't mean the frequency of it , but the way that sex is portrayed. It's bad because all it does is feed thriving stereotypes about black people which aren't necessarily true.

Reviews: I got an opportunity to see Waiting To Exhale for the second time recently, the first time shortly after it came out, and now now. I can't say time has improved my thoughts of the film, which is odd, as I seemed to recall really enjoying this the first time it came out. (Maybe I should watch 'Homeward Bound' again, as I LOVED that movie the first time I saw it) The only actress really to impress in this movie is of course the amazing Angela Bassett who growls and hisses every chance she gets! I really liked this character, and I felt for the trials she was going through. The other character I liked was the one played by Loretta Devine, who was cute as the overweight mother who unexpectedly falls in love. I kind of thought the Lela Rachon character was underwritten, and seemed to almost revel in her wantonness. lol. As for Miss Houston, when I was watching her "act", well, Chesty Morgan's performance in "Deadly Weapons" came to mind for some odd reason, as it appears the acting thing was becoming a struggle, and wasn't going to last for too long.. All in all, I wasn't really disappointed in the film, it just slid off...

Reviews: This was a good movie, even though I'm not the target audience.  It's nice to see that black women had a movie about them, and thanks to the star power of Whitney Houston it became no.1 and was a big hit.  I am actually tired of reading little comments saying that Whitney isn't that good of an actress because all of those comments are based on the fact that she's a singer.  If she wasn't a famous singer, nobody would say anything bad about her acting. IMO, she acted very well just like in all her movies, she's not an oscar caliber actress (very few are) but she definitely has screen presence, charisma and gets the job done.  Stop hating her because she's a singer, unlike Madonna or Mariah, Whitney at least did some quality work with some quality people, and she hasn't had flops & horrible movies.

Na verdade, estou cansada de ler pequenos coment찼rios dizendo que Whitney n찾o 챕 t찾o boa atriz, porque todos esses coment찼rios s찾o baseados no fato de que ela 챕 cantora. Reviews: While this movie truly is bound to be more appealing to women than men, it is a touching story of four best friends. How they stick together and grow together through life's mistakes, joys, and bad taste in men. I love Angela Bassett and she is outstanding in this movie. The other 3 ladies, Whitney,Lela, and Loretta do great jobs too. This movie is filled with sweet moments, great laughter, and maybe some tears. Just a wonderful movie that shows what friendship is about. I have not read the book, but I have heard many times that the book is better... but hey thats true for almost every book turned movie. So all I know is I love this movie, and every time I watch it, it gives me great pleasure. Not too mention the soundtrack is fabulous! Description: George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.

Reviews: The original "Father of the Bride" with Spencer Tracey is a really good comedy, the remake starring Steve Martin is a good sweet-natured, amiable enough comedy - and I don't really think a sequel was necessary at all. I mean the whole premise is basically the same - before George Banks (Martin) had to grasp the reality of his daughter being married, and now he has to come to grips with the fact that she's having a baby. A nice twist on this is that his wife (played by Diane Keaton) is ALSO pregnant, but nevertheless it's still (basically) the same as the first film in one form or another.Thankfully it doesn't seem like a total cash-in (like so many sequels of this sort do) because it has a certain charm (as did the first film) and is still remarkably entertaining, all considered. But you can tell it was made solely because of the success of the first film - even Martin Short is back with another extended cameo as Franz the wedding manager. Of course you may be wondering why he's involved with a pregnancy, since his business is weddings. Here's a hint: more $$$ for the studio.Martin is basically doing the same thing he did in the first film - the weary upper-class guy who feels overwhelmed by the state of things. Diane Keaton is still very sweet and likable as his wife. The rest of the cast (including Macaulay's little brother Kieran Culkin) range from OK to good. Martin Short, however, is yet again a stand-out and is very funny - he wasn't necessary for the plot but he is funny and a good addition to the movie regardless.Overall I'd say this is one of those sequels that didn't need to be made, but could have been a lot worse. It's sweet, it's got some good lite-comedy moments, and in general it's just an enjoyable family movie that isn't trying to be anything other than simple entertainment -- which it is.
movie_name: Father of the Bride Part II
Resenhas: O "Pai da Noiva" original, com Spencer Tracey, 챕 uma com챕dia muito boa, o remake estrelado por Steve Martin 챕 uma com챕dia de boa natureza e am찼vel - e eu realmente n찾o acho que uma sequ챗ncia seja necess찼ria. Quero dizer, toda a premissa 챕 basicamente a mesma - antes de George Banks (Martin) ter que entender a realidade de sua filha ser casada, e agora ele tem que entender o fato de que ela est찼 tendo um beb챗. Uma boa reviravolta nisso 챕 que sua esposa (interpretada por Diane Keaton) TAMB횋M est찼 gr찼vida, mas ainda assim 챕 (basicamente) o mesmo que o primeiro filme, de uma forma ou de outra. Felizmente, n찾o parece um dinheiro total. (como muitas sequ챗ncias desse tipo) porque tem um certo charme (como fez o primeiro filme) e ainda 챕 notavelmente divertido, todos considerados. Mas voc챗 pode dizer que foi feito apenas por causa do sucesso do primeiro filme - mesmo Martin Short est찼 de volta com outra participa챌찾o especial como Franz, o gerente de casamentos. Claro que voc챗 pode estar se perguntando por que ele est찼 envolvido com uma gravidez, j찼 que o neg처cio dele 챕 casamentos. Martin est찼 basicamente fazendo a mesma coisa que fez no primeiro filme - o cara cansado da classe alta que se sente impressionado com o estado das coisas. Diane Keaton ainda 챕 muito gentil e simp찼tica como sua esposa. O resto do elenco (incluindo o irm찾o mais novo de Macaulay, Kieran Culkin) varia de bom a bom. Martin Short, no entanto, 챕 mais uma vez um destaque e 챕 muito engra챌ado - ele n찾o era necess찼rio para o enredo, mas ele 챕 engra챌ado e um bom complemento para o filme, independentemente disso. n찾o precisava ser feito, mas poderia ter sido muito pior. 횋 doce, tem alguns bons momentos de com챕dia e, em geral, 챕 apenas um filme de fam챠lia agrad찼vel que n찾o est찼 tentando ser outra coisa sen찾o entretenimento simples - o que 챕.

Reviews: As much as I want to rag this movie, make fun of it, call it all kinds of names, belittle it, mock it and otherwise totally trash it, I can't and that is for one reason: Steve Martin. Mr. Martin saves this movie from cinematic oblivion, allows this movie to survive, function and prosper. He is proof that an actor can save a sorry script, can raise the level of a story, can make a movie watchable. Mr. Martin proves once again that he is arguably the finest comedy actor today. He can take the dumbest line and make it sound brilliant; he can take the most insipid scene and raise it to the level of comedy or drama. Kudos to Steve Martin for his sterling performance. As for the other star, Diane Keaton, her performance is wonderful too, but it is Mr. Martin who carries this movie and once again proves that he is the star.
movie_name: Father of the Bride Part II
Resenhas: Por mais que eu queira atormentar esse filme, tirar sarro dele, cham찼-lo de todos os tipos de nomes, menosprez찼-lo, zomb찼-lo e jog찼-lo totalmente no lixo, n찾o posso e 챕 por uma raz찾o: Steve Martin. Martin salva este filme do esquecimento cinematogr찼fico, permite que ele sobreviva, funcione e prospere. Reviews: A sequel to immensely likable Father of the Bride, 'Father of the Bride Part II' is A Well-Done Sequel! Its enjoyable as well as emotional!'Father of the Bride Part II' Synopsis: George Banks must accept the reality of what his daughter's ascension from daughter to wife, and now, to mother means when placed into perspective against his own stage of life. 'Father of the Bride Part II' is worthy sequel of a wonderful prequel. The characters still appeal, the humor works & the emotional moments are heartfelt as well. Nancy Meyers & Charles Shyer's Screenplay is genuinely well-done. Charles Shyer's Direction, on the other-hand, is good. Cinematography & Editing are fair.Performance-Wise: Steve Martin is lovable. He reprises his part of a loving/possessive dad commendably. Diane Keaton is flawless, yet again. Kimberly Williams-Paisley is cute. George Newbern is sincere. Kieran Culkin is adequate. Martin Short entertains.On the whole, 'Father of the Bride Part II' is a satisfying sequel.
movie_name: Father of the Bride Part II

'Pai da Noiva Parte II' Sinopse: George Banks deve aceitar a realidade da ascens찾o de sua filha de filha para esposa e, agora, para m찾e significa quando colocado em perspectiva contra seu pr처prio est찼gio da vida. 'Pai da Noiva Parte II' 챕 uma sequ챗ncia digna de um prequel maravilhoso. Os personagens ainda apelam, o humor funciona e os momentos emocionais tamb챕m s찾o sinceros. O roteiro de Nancy Meyers e Charles Shyer 챕 genuinamente bem-feito. A dire챌찾o de Charles Shyer, por outro lado, 챕 boa. Cinematografia e edi챌찾o s찾o justas. Desempenho-s찼bio: Steve Martin 챕 ador찼vel. Martin Short entret챕m. No geral, 'Father of the Bride Part II' 챕 uma sequ챗ncia satisfat처ria.

Reviews: as sequels go,this is film isn't too bad.i didn't think ti was quite as good as the first one,but it's not a bad effort.i didn't find it as funny,and some of Steve Martin's histrionics are old and seem forced a bit too me.really,this one doesn't quite have the same sincerity as the first.through much of this movie,i was all too aware i was watching a movie,whereas with firs tone,i was drawn in,and less aware i was watching a movie with people acting.having said that,there are some bright spots.for,one,this movie is just as touching as the first.and Eugene levy has a great cameo.and there is still some fun to be had.even though this may seem too high a rating after much of what i said above,i still think Father of the Bride II is a 7/10

Reviews: While no where near the quality of Father's Little Dividend, the Spencer Tracy vehicle that was the sequel to the original Father of the Bride, Father of the Bride II is not the worst way to while away a lazy weekend afternoon. The plot follows a fairly predictable series of events with little by way of character development. The actors are talented and that makes all the difference. I can't help but find myself tearing up every darn time I watch this schlock-fest.I am rather amazed however that no reviewer has commented on the unnecessarily negative portrayal of "Mr. Habib" (a cameo by Eugene Levy) as the arrogant, misogynistic Arab who buys the Banks' beloved home. With both Keaton and Martin well known for their liberal politics, I'm surprised neither objected to this tired depiction of a Southern California real estate trope.
movie_name: Father of the Bride Part II

I saw the cast had a lot of great comedians, so I thought there would at least be a few laughs. Instead, I was surprised to see a very touching movie, absolutely great script. I give it 7 out of 10.

Also, I was surprised that Martin Short sported his accent again. Kudos to Charles Shyer and everyone involved for a job well done. Now, in conclusion, if you are a fan Steve Martin, Diane Keaton, or Martin Short, or if you liked FATHER OF THE BRIDE, I highly recommend this movie. You're in for a feel good time, so see this movie today. You're in for a good time, so go to the video store, rent it or buy it, kick back with a friend, and watch it.

It has all the comedic elements that were stagnant in the first movie.  It's everything the first movie should have been, and more!

Reviews: Take the big moment of this movie. What the trailers touted. What was supposed to be the meeting of giants. The coffee scene with Deniro and Pacino. Both legendary film actors with credentials that are undeniable. What possessed them to allow this scene to get to the screen is beyond me. If your 10 years old you could have written the dialog. If your not and have kids, they have. In fact I have written this dialog as have many people that have put pen to paper and were ever drawn to cop/robber dramatic films. "your going down brother" Need I say more.Then I read the reviews here and I am even more stunned. If you eliminate the horrific Pacino/Deniro scene you have a decent movie. Perhaps I would have given it a 5. Plot lines that were meaningless. A movie that tried very, very hard to be something more than it is, or was. Over direction. And the rest of the script wasn't Shakespeare either. It wasn't just the "big" scene. It was all of them. Kilmer's part was comical. I don't think that was the intent.Anyway, I suppose, based on the unbelievable reviews for this movie here, I am in the vast minority. So if you haven't seen it yet all I would say is this. If we assume you have some degree of film intellect, then do not expect to see what you read in some of these reviews. If you go in not expecting much you may very well enjoy this very ordinary movie. if you go in expected the "Best movie of the 90s" or a "masterpiece" you may be sorely disappointed. I will laugh about these reviews for days. Utterly amazing otherwise intelligent people could be hypnotized by the hype of this film. Guys, at best it's a 5 out of 10.
Resenhas: Tome o grande momento deste filme. O que os trailers divulgaram. O que deveria ser o encontro de gigantes. A cena do caf챕 com Deniro e Pacino. Se voc챗 n찾o tem e tem filhos, eles t챗m. De fato, escrevi esse di찼logo, assim como muitas pessoas que colocaram a caneta no papel e foram sempre atra챠das para filmes dram찼ticos de policial / ladr찾o. "voc챗 est찼 indo para baixo, irm찾o", preciso dizer mais alguma coisa. Ent찾o li os coment찼rios aqui e fico ainda mais atordoada. Se voc챗 eliminar a cena horr챠vel de Pacino / Deniro, ter찼 um filme decente. Talvez eu tivesse dado 5. Linhas de tra챌ado que n찾o tinham sentido. Um filme que tentou muito, muito dif챠cil ser algo mais do que 챕 ou era. Sobre dire챌찾o. E o resto do roteiro tamb챕m n찾o era Shakespeare. N찾o era apenas a cena "grande". Foram todos eles. A parte de Kilmer era c척mica. N찾o acho que essa seja a inten챌찾o. De qualquer forma, suponho que, com base nas cr챠ticas inacredit찼veis ?뗢땛ara este filme aqui, estou na vasta minoria. Ent찾o, se voc챗 ainda n찾o viu, tudo o que eu diria 챕 isso. Se assumirmos que voc챗 tem algum grau de intelig챗ncia no cinema, n찾o espere ver o que l챗 em algumas dessas an찼lises. Se voc챗 n찾o espera muito, pode muito bem apreciar este filme muito comum. se voc챗 espera o "Melhor filme dos anos 90" ou uma "obra-prima", pode ficar muito decepcionado. Vou rir desses coment찼rios por dias. Pessoas absolutamente surpreendentes, de outra forma inteligentes, poderiam ser hipnotizadas pelo hype deste filme. Gente, na melhor das hip처teses, s찾o 5 em 10.
Description: Spoof of the casual sexual adventures of a one-time child actor in Hollywood. It also involves a bratty on-again, off-again lesbian character.

Reviews: What passes for epic cinema these days can be found in Heat, a noisy, bombastic, self reverential cops and robbers bore that between gun battles drags for most of it's three hour (yes three) running time.Detective Vin Hanna (Al Pacino) is a standout cop with almost as many bad marriages as commendations. Neil MacCauley (Robert DiNero) is a career criminal always bent on the big score. Both men are very methodical and take great pride in their professionalism. After botching a brinks job Hanna pursues the gang which is beginning to fray at the edges. Mac Cauley realizes it's tough to get good help these days and decides on one last score before calling it quits.Showcasing the biggest meeting since Truman met Stalin at Potsdam director Michael Mann treats the first meeting of Pacino and DiNero together (both were in Godfather 2 but appeared in no scenes together) with the same solemnity as the two actors wheeze through their moment. With nothing new or revelatory to say, they show manly respect and understanding for each other. The problem is the scene is more about these closely identified highly regarded actors than the characters they play. Their star wattage (as well as their skills) may have dimmed by 95 but their legendary status carried a lot of weight. It's about as interesting as two old codgers reminiscing on an old folks home porch and rings hollow like the rest of this lumbering elephant of a film.The convoluted plot is filled with forgettable characters but it does allow Mann to wander around LA spreading gratuitous violence. The women in the film are relegated to looking tired and concerned over their boy friends, acting as sounding boards for the guys to spew their Mannly philosophy about honor and being true to your skills.The action scenes are big, loud, bloody, poorly edited and ridiculous as LA empties out to let the boys shoot it out in grand fashion on the streets. The badly paced montage of Al and Bobby dashing up and down the avenues with some very big weapons (size is everything to Mann)playing cops and robbers runs out of steam before they run out of bullets.By the time they made Heat Pacino and DiNero had peaked before doing self parody (though Pacino would go on to give a stellar performance worthy of his early years as Roy Cohn in Angels in America) and it shows in their lackluster tired performances magnified even further by the film stealing effort turned in by Val Kilmer as gang member Chris. Kilmer's energy and the self confident way he moves and acts delivers the passion the two stars lack.As in some of his other films Mann explores the theme of moral relativism with usual heavy handed pretension attempting to bestow nobility on the good as well as the bad, solemnizing the whole ponderous affair with Elliot Goldenthal's vapid score that is more appropriate for a coronation than a shoot'em up.In Heat MacCauley states "Never have anything in your life that you can't walk out of in thirty seconds flat". One should keep this in mind before watching this big helium balloon of hot air.
Resenhas: O que passa pelo cinema 챕pico nos dias de hoje pode ser encontrado em Heat, um policial barulhento, bomb찼stico e auto-reverente e ladr찾o que, entre batalhas, se arrasta durante a maior parte do tempo de tr챗s horas (sim, tr챗s) de dura챌찾o. um policial de destaque com quase tantos maus casamentos quanto elogios. Neil MacCauley (Robert DiNero) 챕 um criminoso de carreira sempre empenhado na grande pontua챌찾o. Ambos s찾o muito met처dicos e t챗m muito orgulho de seu profissionalismo. Depois de fracassar no trabalho, Hanna persegue a gangue que come챌a a se desgastar nas bordas. Apresentando a maior reuni찾o desde Truman conhecer Stalin no diretor de Potsdam, Michael Mann trata a primeira reuni찾o de Pacino e DiNero juntos (ambos estavam no padrinho 2). mas n찾o apareceu em cenas juntas) com a mesma solenidade que os dois atores sibilam durante o momento. Sem nada de novo ou revelador a dizer, eles mostram respeito e compreens찾o masculinos um pelo outro. O problema 챕 que a cena 챕 mais sobre esses atores altamente conceituados e bem identificados do que os personagens que eles interpretam. Sua pot챗ncia em estrela (assim como suas habilidades) pode ter diminu챠do em 95, mas seu status lend찼rio carregava muito peso. A trama conturbada 챕 repleta de personagens esquec챠veis, mas permite que Mann passeie por Los Angeles, espalhando viol챗ncia gratuita. As mulheres do filme s찾o relegadas a parecer cansadas e preocupadas com seus amigos, agindo como caixas de resson창ncia para os rapazes vomitar sua filosofia Mannly sobre honra e ser fiel 횪s suas habilidades. As cenas de a챌찾o s찾o grandes, barulhentas, sangrentas e mal editadas. e rid챠culo como LA esvazia para deixar os meninos atirar em grande estilo nas ruas. A montagem em ritmo acelerado de Al e Bobby correndo pelas avenidas com algumas armas muito grandes (o tamanho 챕 tudo para Mann), jogando policiais e ladr천es fica sem vapor antes que fiquem sem balas. No momento em que fizeram Heat Pacino e DiNero havia atingido o pico antes de fazer a auto-par처dia (embora Pacino continuasse a apresentar uma performance estelar digna de seus primeiros anos como Roy Cohn em Angels in America) e mostra em suas performances cansadas e sem brilho, ampliadas ainda mais pelo esfor챌o de roubo de filme apresentado por Val Kilmer como membro da gangue Chris. A energia de Kilmer e a maneira autoconfiante de como ele se move e age entregam a paix찾o que as duas estrelas n찾o t챗m. Como em alguns de seus outros filmes, Mann explora o tema do relativismo moral com a habitual pretens찾o de m찾o pesada, tentando conferir nobreza tanto aos bons quanto aos maus. , solenizando todo o caso ponderoso com a pontua챌찾o ins챠pida de Elliot Goldenthal, mais apropriada para uma coroa챌찾o do que um tiro na cabe챌a. Em Heat MacCauley declara: "Nunca tenha nada em sua vida que voc챗 n찾o possa sair em trinta segundos". Deve-se ter isso em mente antes de assistir a este grande bal찾o de h챕lio de ar quente.
Description: Spoof of the casual sexual adventures of a one-time child actor in Hollywood. It also involves a bratty on-again, off-again lesbian character.

Reviews: Having seen almost every classic and influential crime drama of the past 30 years, I finally got around to seeing Heat. Having heard about how influential it has been in other movies and video games, I couldn't believe that I had waited so long to see this movie. Boy, was I disappointed. This movie is far from the masterpiece that I was led to believe. Other than a couple of great crime scenes (and a little bit of great action), I can't think of much that this film had that would make me want to see it again.While I wouldn't characterize the acting as bad, I can't think of anyone in this movie who gave a performance that is among their better ones. Al Pacino is practically a caricature of himself the entire time. He overacts in every scene and he yells about half of his lines. Robert Deniro has the same scowl on his face and speaks in pretty much the same voice for the whole movie. Pacino and Deniro fans looking for some "tough guy" porn will find plenty of it here.Ultimately, Heat is a movie that could have been made better by cutting about half the content. It is loaded with characters that are poorly developed, but are dramatically presented as if you are supposed to give a crap about any of them. One of them gets killed after about four minutes of screen time, and after that, we see his grieving wife. Rather than cry with her, I just kind of rolled my eyes. Another gang members death is presented with the drama akin to a squad mate getting killed in a war movie. I could have cared less. Val Kilmer's subplot centers around the tenuous relationship that he has with his wife. Al Pacino has a lousy third marriage and Robert Deniro somehow manages to have a romance side plot that is neither relevant nor believable.There is even a suicide attempt scene that has nothing whatsoever to do with the story ??a diversion that will have you scratching your head, wondering why so much celluloid was wasted on it. Without exception, every single scene with a female in it could have been left on the cutting room floor, and not one shred of value would have been lost. None of the characters are sympathetic or well developed enough for you to want to see their romances work or to be able to share their pain. It would have worked well maybe in a television series where you would have more time to develop the characters, but here, all of the side plot material is really boring.One of the draws of this movie seems to be that it is a "realistic" and non ideal take on human behavior. Okay, I get that, but if you are going to go with the "realistic" approach, then don't ruin it with the occasional unbelievable scene or plot hole. The biggest offender is the famous bank robbery scene in the middle of the movie. It would have been spectacular in an action movie that didn't take itself seriously. But in Heat, I couldn't stop thinking about how absurd it was that a few guys with automatic weapons were able to cut through the entire LAPD like a hot knife through butter, escaping clean in the process. I still greatly enjoyed that scene, largely because it's just a great action scene that is well choreographed and shot. However, it's sort of out of place in this film.I'll give Heat some credit for not being a by-the-numbers cops and robbers movie. Maybe it is this uniqueness and the time of its release that made it so popular. Upon reflection though, there have been many crime and caper movies over the past few decades that are more entertaining than this one. Scarface, Reservoir Dogs, The Usual Suspects, to name but a few. While I didn't hate this movie, I certainly don't think that it deserves a place in the Top 10 greatest crime dramas.
Resenhas: Tendo visto quase todos os drama policial cl찼ssico e influente dos 첬ltimos 30 anos, finalmente cheguei a ver Heat. Tendo ouvido falar sobre o qu찾o influente tem sido em outros filmes e videogames, eu n찾o podia acreditar que havia esperado tanto tempo para ver este filme. Rapaz, fiquei desapontado. Este filme est찼 longe de ser a obra-prima em que fui levado a acreditar. Al챕m de algumas 처timas cenas de crime (e um pouco de muita a챌찾o), n찾o consigo pensar em muita coisa que este filme teve que me faria querer v챗-lo novamente.Enquanto eu n찾o caracterizaria a atua챌찾o como ruim, N찾o consigo pensar em ningu챕m neste filme que tenha apresentado uma performance que esteja entre as melhores. Al Pacino 챕 praticamente uma caricatura de si mesmo o tempo todo. Ele exagera em todas as cenas e grita cerca de metade de suas falas. Robert Deniro tem a mesma carranca no rosto e fala praticamente a mesma voz durante todo o filme. Os f찾s de Pacino e Deniro, que procuram por pornografia "durona", encontrar찾o bastante aqui. Finalmente, Heat 챕 um filme que poderia ter sido melhorado cortando cerca da metade do conte첬do. Ele 챕 carregado com personagens pouco desenvolvidos, mas s찾o apresentados de forma dram찼tica, como se voc챗 desse uma merda sobre qualquer um deles. Um deles 챕 morto ap처s cerca de quatro minutos de exibi챌찾o, e depois disso, vemos sua esposa em luto. Em vez de chorar com ela, eu meio que revirei os olhos. Outra morte de membros de gangue 챕 apresentada com o drama semelhante a um companheiro de esquadr찾o sendo morto em um filme de guerra. Eu poderia ter me importado menos. A subtrama de Val Kilmer gira em torno do t챗nue relacionamento que ele tem com a esposa. Al Pacino tem um p챕ssimo terceiro casamento e Robert Deniro, de alguma forma, consegue ter uma trama paralela que n찾o 챕 relevante nem cr챠vel. cabe챌a, imaginando por que tanto celul처ide foi desperdi챌ado nela. Sem exce챌찾o, todas as cenas com uma mulher poderiam ter sido deixadas no ch찾o da sala de corte, e nenhum fragmento de valor teria sido perdido. Nenhum dos personagens 챕 simp찼tico ou bem desenvolvido o suficiente para voc챗 querer ver seus romances funcionando ou ser capaz de compartilhar sua dor. Teria funcionado bem, talvez em uma s챕rie de televis찾o onde voc챗 teria mais tempo para desenvolver os personagens, mas aqui, todo o material da trama 챕 realmente muito chato. Um dos desenhos deste filme parece ser um "realista" "e n찾o ideal assumem o comportamento humano. Ok, entendi isso, mas se voc챗 optar pela abordagem "realista", n찾o a estrague com a cena inacredit찼vel ocasional ou o buraco na trama. O maior criminoso 챕 a famosa cena de assalto a banco no meio do filme. Teria sido espetacular em um filme de a챌찾o que n찾o se levou a s챕rio. Mas no Heat, eu n찾o conseguia parar de pensar no qu찾o absurdo era o fato de alguns caras com armas autom찼ticas serem capazes de atravessar toda a pol챠cia de Los Angeles como uma faca quente na manteiga, escapando do processo. Eu ainda gostei muito dessa cena, principalmente porque 챕 apenas uma 처tima cena de a챌찾o que 챕 bem coreografada e filmada. No entanto, 챕 meio fora de lugar neste filme. Eu darei a Heat algum cr챕dito por n찾o ser um filme policial e ladr찾o. Talvez seja essa singularidade e a 챕poca de seu lan챌amento que a tornaram t찾o popular. Ap처s a reflex찾o, por챕m, houve muitos filmes de crime e de alcaparras nas 첬ltimas d챕cadas que s찾o mais divertidos do que este. Scarface, C찾es Reservat처rios, Os suspeitos do costume, para citar apenas alguns. Embora eu n찾o tenha odiado esse filme, certamente n찾o acho que mere챌a um lugar nos 10 maiores dramas criminais.

Reviews: Micheal Manns'(director of 'The Insider', and 'Manhunter') smooth, straightforward direction is studded with brilliant and very memorable cinematic gems in 'Heat',  A bullet riddled drama with, yes , Al Pacino and Robert De Niro in their first on screen meeting.What do you want to hear about 'Heat'.  Is it DeNiro's best performance? No. Is it Pacino's best performance? I'd be lying if I said it was.   Do the performances improve the story? Absolutely.   Mann has written (he wrote it as well) a complex and exciting two-sided story that develops the hunter Vincent Hanna (Pacino) and the hunted Neil McCauley (De Niro)  separately throughout much of the film.  Underneath a hail of bullets Mann is able to paint both lead characters with the same brush by delving into the similarly tragic and chaotic personal lives of Hanna and McCauley, allowing for the final epic scene, which would have been too pretentious if it were not for the excellent performances of Pacino and De Niro.Bottom Line:  Not having seen this movie is akin to idiocy for anyone claiming to be a fan of movies.   9 out of 10
Resenhas: Micheal Manns (diretor de 'The Insider' e 'Manhunter'), dire챌찾o suave e direta, 챕 repleta de joias cinematogr찼ficas brilhantes e muito memor찼veis ?뗢땎m 'Heat', um drama cheio de balas com, sim, Al Pacino e Robert De Niro em sua primeira reuni찾o na tela. O que voc챗 quer ouvir sobre 'Calor'. 횋 o melhor desempenho do DeNiro? N찾o. 횋 o melhor desempenho do Pacino? Eu estaria mentindo se dissesse que era. As performances melhoram a hist처ria? Absolutamente. Mann escreveu (ele tamb챕m escreveu) uma hist처ria complexa e emocionante de dois lados que desenvolve o ca챌ador Vincent Hanna (Pacino) e o ca챌ado Neil McCauley (De Niro) separadamente durante grande parte do filme. Sob uma onda de balas, Mann 챕 capaz de pintar os dois personagens principais com o mesmo pincel, mergulhando na vida pessoal igualmente tr찼gica e ca처tica de Hanna e McCauley, permitindo a cena 챕pica final, que seria muito pretensiosa se n찾o fosse por os excelentes desempenhos de Pacino e De Niro.Bottom Line: N찾o ter visto esse filme 챕 uma idiotice para quem se diz f찾 de filmes. 9 de 10

Reviews: Netflix's Indonesian horror film engine is running full-bore; and high on its grotesque witches, vibrantly colored worlds, and juvenile writing, is chugging out a lot of black smoke that is choking the viewers to death. Sabrina is fourth horror release to come out of Indonesia in recent times, after "The 3rd Eye," "Kuntilanak," and "May The Devil Take You".All the above movies have many commonalities: All of them have decent actors. All of them feature vibrant colors--the kinds you see in kindergarten playrooms; and the kinds that are unfit for scary movies--even Stephen King's "It" with a mischievous clown used a toned-down palette. All of them are infested with tar-vomiting, wall-climbing demons. Finally, all of them have no story to tell.Even within Indonesian horror universe, this movie is clearly the worst of the lot... so far.So, say goodbye to Sabrina even before you say hello.*Chucky and Annabelle snigger.*
Resenhas: O mecanismo de filmes de terror indon챕sio da Netflix est찼 funcionando a todo vapor; e no alto de suas bruxas grotescas, mundos de cores vibrantes e letras juvenis, h찼 muita fuma챌a negra que sufoca os espectadores at챕 a morte. Sabrina 챕 o quarto filme de terror a sair da Indon챕sia nos 첬ltimos tempos, depois de "The 3rd Eye", "Kuntilanak" e "May The Devil Take You". Todos os filmes acima t챗m muitos pontos em comum: todos eles t챗m atores decentes. Todos eles apresentam cores vibrantes - os tipos que voc챗 v챗 nas salas de jogos do jardim de inf창ncia; e os tipos impr처prios para filmes de terror - at챕 "It", de Stephen King, com um palha챌o travesso, usava uma paleta atenuada. Todos eles est찾o infestados de v척mitos de alcatr찾o e dem척nios que escalam paredes. Finalmente, todos eles n찾o t챗m hist처ria para contar. Mesmo no universo de terror indon챕sio, este filme 챕 claramente o pior de todos ... at챕 agora.Ent찾o, diga adeus a Sabrina antes mesmo de dizer ol찼. * Chucky e Annabelle riem. *

Resenhas: Este 챕 um filme de terror muito brega, mas colorido e de aventura. Eu diria que isso 챕 mais direcionado aos pr챕-adolescentes. N찾o espere muito, por챕m, escrever e atuar 챕 lixo.
Description: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

Reviews: Sabrina is a neat little film ruined by a number of flaws that prevent it from being something really special.This Indonesian made Netflix original at first glimpse you'd assume is a killer doll-esque movie, but that couldn't be further from the truth. If you're looking for Chucky or Robert the doll you'll be sorely disappointed, this is more your possession type film.Now regarding the possession sub-genre I generally don't like them, the tropes they hold tend to bore me but thankfully they throw most of them out the window here and go for something somewhat more exciting.Now I can't say much about the plot without giving something away so I'll not bother. I will however say that when the story is finally laid out in front of you I think you'll be pleasantly surprised, it's well constructed and very much not predictable.Again as mentioned sadly the film does have its flaws, a couple regard the story and one near the end took this down from a potential 7 to 6. Another is the lack of consistency, it plays out like a serious horror yet has moments of ultra cheesiness that ruin the atmosphere altogether.Regardless this is a very fun, exciting and oddly scary in places little film that is not what you'd expect it to be. Despite my underwhelming rating I would recommend this.The Good:Surprisingly well constructed plotSome genuinely creepy momentsThe Bad:Some poor cameraworkBizarre soundtrack choicesOddly cheesy in placesSilly finaleI struggled to tell the two leading ladies apartThings I Learnt From This Movie:I'm left wondering if the casting director specifically sought out the sickest looking girl they could for the roleDemonic possession causes nose growth

Resenhas: Este 챕 um 처timo conto de horror / sobrenatural com 처tima maquiagem, atua챌찾o e cinematografia. Se voc챗 챕 um verdadeiro f찾 de filmes internacionais, n찾o procure mais pelas pr처ximas duas horas! Voc챗 n찾o vai se decepcionar.
Description: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

Description: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

Reviews: After solving a deadly case, a husband-and-wife looking after their orphaned niece find that her connection to a special doll made by his company causes a sudden outpouring of supernatural activity towards them in retaliation for actions years ago and must find a way to contain the evil spirit.For such a maligned film, this one turned out to be rather enjoyable. One of the strongest aspects here is the supernatural elements which are quite prominent creating a wholly chilling atmosphere. The opening sequence of them rescuing the possessed woman in the house offers a nice start here by dropping us into this world rather early, while the eerie sequence of the daughter searching for her mother in the darkened house during the driving rainstorm after playing the board game to contact her offers up some nice imagery. Once this moves on to trying to drive the mother crazy, this one provides some outright chilling sequences that work rather well. The common trope of a child's toy being used for a ghost-finder throughout the house brings about some great scenes of her searching the house alone or interacting off-screen with what she claims is her mother are what really bring some great times this one. This early setup for the film allows for more fun to occur in the second half. Already fully aware of something going on, the film ratchets up the tension and scares with the explosion of supernatural activity. The fateful vacation trip to the tropical island is rife with incredible scenes, from the collection of shells along the beach where they mention the mother's presence at the location all along, a traumatic burial in the sand where they get pulled in and then quickly buried and follows that with a highlight reel montage inside the reception hall. From the piano ghost to the chase into the closet providing one of the greatest jump-scares in the film and coming back to include the final encounter with the husband. This extended and charged sequence makes for a truly chilling and creepy sequence that's far better than expected. Once back home, the seance ritual to understand the situation as well as the resolution of the opening confrontation offer up the expected setup for the action-packed finale that really works with the strong rituals and ceremonies presenting their battle with the demonic being around the factory where the doll is produced. Alongside the gory murders and fine demon makeup, these here are what hold this one up over it's few minor flaws. The main issue to contend with is the tolerance for cliches present, since this plays out almost exactly like other films involving this particular setup. It's not a surprise at all as to what's going on in the film because it rips so many scenes and tropes off from those films, ranging from writing off the child's stories of seeing the deceased around them, openly admitting to having disobeyed her instructions because of her mother and the disbelieving spouse who won't listen to reason due to the innocence of the child involved. Along with a favorable attitude towards jump-scares to pay off it's tenser moments, these are brought over from numerous other films all playing up this familiar concept. Likewise, the film's reliance on explaining everything through voiceover flashbacks gets rather tedious with it jumping around in the timeline and does offer up some confusion as to what's going on at the moment. Otherwise, there isn't much to dislike here.Rated Unrated/R: Graphic Violence, Language and continuous themes of children-in-jeopardy.

Para um filme t찾o maligno, este acabou sendo bastante agrad찼vel. Um dos aspectos mais fortes aqui s찾o os elementos sobrenaturais que s찾o bastante proeminentes, criando uma atmosfera totalmente arrepiante. Description: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

Reviews: Tom Sawyer (Jonathan Taylor Thomas) runs away and is rescued by Huck Finn (Brad Renfro). They see Injun Joe and Muff Potter digging up the grave of Vic 'One-Eyed' Murrell to retrieve a treasure map for Doctor Robinson. Injun Joe murders Doc Robinson with Muff's knife. Muff is arrested for the murder. Tom is torn between an oath to Huck and his need to exonerate an innocent man.The production looks weak. This Disney doesn't have the needed edge and doesn't even have Disney money. The story has too many killings to be a kiddie movie. The movie doesn't have the grittiness to feel real. Jonathan Taylor Thomas used to be a thing back in the day. He's cute with a twinkle in his eye. I don't lay too much on him. He just doesn't have the toughness unlike Brad Renfro. Rachael Leigh Cook is a cutie in this one. This movie's tone is all over the place.
Resenhas: Tom Sawyer (Jonathan Taylor Thomas) foge e 챕 resgatado por Huck Finn (Brad Renfro). Eles v챗em Injun Joe e Muff Potter cavando o t첬mulo de Vic 'One-Eyed' Murrell para recuperar um mapa do tesouro para o Dr. Robinson. Injun Joe mata Doc Robinson com a faca de Muff. Muff 챕 preso pelo assassinato. Tom est찼 dividido entre um juramento a Huck e sua necessidade de exonerar um homem inocente. A produ챌찾o parece fraca. Esta Disney n찾o tem a vantagem necess찼ria e nem sequer tem dinheiro da Disney. A hist처ria tem muitos assassinatos para ser um filme infantil. O filme n찾o tem coragem de parecer real. Jonathan Taylor Thomas costumava ser uma coisa de antigamente. Ele 챕 fofo com um brilho nos olhos. Eu n찾o deito muito nele. Ele simplesmente n찾o tem a dureza ao contr찼rio de Brad Renfro. Rachael Leigh Cook 챕 uma gracinha neste. O tom deste filme est찼 em todo lugar.
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: A mischievous young boy, Tom Sawyer (Jonathan Taylor Thomas),witnesses a murder by the deadly Injun Joe. Tom becomes friends with Huckleberry Finn (Brad Renfro), a boy with no future and no family.Going through the Top 250 lists from various years, somehow this ended up on the list for 1996. Of all the lists from 1996 through 2014, this first list is the most bizarre. Others have films that clearly do not belong, but none more than the 1996 list. And this is a prime example. How did a film that barely ranks above 5 out of 10 manage to be considered one of the best of all time? Not that this is a bad film. As far as kid stories go, it is alright, and not the worst introduction to the world of Mark Twain. But it is clearly not intended to be a masterpiece, but more like something one might see on the Hallmark channel. Just a showcase for the now-forgotten Jonathan Taylor Thomas.

Tom se torna amigo de Huckleberry Finn (Brad Renfro), um garoto sem futuro e sem fam챠lia. Indo pelas 250 principais listas de v찼rios anos, de alguma forma isso acabou na lista para 1996. De todas as listas de 1996 a 2014, esse A primeira lista 챕 a mais bizarra. Outros t챗m filmes que claramente n찾o pertencem, mas nada al챕m da lista de 1996. E este 챕 um excelente exemplo. Como um filme que mal ocupa acima de 5 em 10 conseguiu ser considerado um dos melhores de todos os tempos? N찾o que este seja um filme ruim. No que diz respeito 횪s hist처rias infantis, est찼 tudo bem, e n찾o 챕 a pior introdu챌찾o ao mundo de Mark Twain. Mas claramente n찾o se destina a ser uma obra-prima, mas mais como algo que se pode ver no canal Hallmark. Apenas uma vitrine para o agora esquecido Jonathan Taylor Thomas.
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: There are things that Tom and Huck does do right. The three best things about it are the production values, the score and Eric Schweig as Injun Joe. The film looks very pretty with quite evocative costumes and sets, while the score is both memorable and relaxing. Schweig is perfect as Injun Joe and genuinely menacing, though the writers perhaps go a little overboard with the villainous and somewhat violent side to him. Brad Renfro does do well as Huck, the character does come across as too sullen and hard but Renfro is suitably mischievous and brings some fun amongst bringing out a somewhat conflicted side to Huck. There are some effective scenes, the graveyard scene is very atmospheric and the moment when Injun Joe starts to stir/stirs when Tom is reaching for the map sends chills up the spine. The whitewashing scene is very charming as well. There are some mixed feelings assets here. Jonathan Taylor Thomas(of whom Tom and Huck is like a vehicle for him early in his career) makes for a spirited Tom but the more dramatic moments(the courtroom scene is quite good though) show signs of inexperience. Peter Hewitt's filmography has been hit and miss, Tom and Huck is one of his better films and thankfully is not another Zoom or Thunderpants but his best film will always be Bill and Ted's Bogus Journey(that and The Borrowers, of the films I've seen so far of his, are the only ones that have ratings better than decent). Tom and Huck does have its failings though, the worst case was the grossly out-of-kilter way Becky was written, if there is a more selfish and bitchy Becky on any film adaptation of Tom Sawyer it's yet to be seen and Rachael Leigh Cook while attractive does come across as forced and stereotypical-teen-like in her acting. There are some fun moments injected in the more nostalgic and charming moments seen in the first half but the second half, where it's all suspense thriller and Injun Joe on the rampage feels like a different film altogether, the two halves just juxtapose too much. The crucial scenes are there even when the adaptation is quite loose but the heart is lacking. The funeral scene falls flat being very under-characterised and rushed through, and the "engagement" scene came across as overly-sentimental(an attempt by Disney to make the story more timely) and awkward as well. The worst bit of dialogue was Becky's "What? I'm not the first? I hope you die", not only is it a terrible and shallow thing to say in the first place but it is something that Becky would never dream of saying. Much of the dialogue is weak, not just that line from Becky but the whole style is not very nuanced and it feels at times too modern. Little attempt also is made to bringing Missouri's dialect, language and how they speak, the production values did a great job in being evocative, why didn't the writing make an effort too? And this is coming from someone to makes a big effort in judging films/TV series/literary adaptations on their own terms. Other than Huck, Injun Joe and to a lesser extent Tom, the rest of the actors suffer from their characters being underdeveloped and don't register as a result really. To conclude, Tom and Huck is alright as a film though with many problems but along with the Soviet film(with the bad dubbing, pacing and editing) it is one of the weaker adaptations of a great book. 5/10 Bethany Cox
Resenhas: H찼 coisas que Tom e Huck fazem certo. As tr챗s melhores coisas s찾o os valores de produ챌찾o, a pontua챌찾o e Eric Schweig como Injun Joe. O filme parece muito bonito, com figurinos e cen찼rios bastante sugestivos, enquanto a trilha sonora 챕 memor찼vel e relaxante. Schweig 챕 perfeito como Injun Joe e genuinamente amea챌ador, embora os escritores talvez exagerem um pouco com o lado vil찾o e um tanto violento dele. Brad Renfro se sai bem como Huck, o personagem parece muito taciturno e duro, mas Renfro 챕 adequadamente travesso e traz um pouco de divers찾o ao trazer um lado um tanto conflitante para Huck. Existem algumas cenas eficazes, a cena do cemit챕rio 챕 muito atmosf챕rica e o momento em que Injun Joe come챌a a se mexer / agitar quando Tom est찼 alcan챌ando o mapa envia arrepios na espinha. A cena da lavagem de branco tamb챕m 챕 muito charmosa. Existem alguns sentimentos contradit처rios aqui. Jonathan Taylor Thomas (de quem Tom e Huck 챕 como um ve챠culo para ele no in챠cio de sua carreira) contribui para um Tom animado, mas os momentos mais dram찼ticos (a cena do tribunal 챕 bastante boa) mostram sinais de inexperi챗ncia. A filmografia de Peter Hewitt foi um sucesso, Tom e Huck 챕 um de seus melhores filmes e, felizmente, n찾o 챕 outro Zoom ou Thunderpants, mas seu melhor filme sempre ser찼 Bogus Journey, de Bill e Ted (que e Os Mutu찼rios, dos filmes que eu vistos at챕 agora, s찾o os 첬nicos que t챗m classifica챌천es melhores do que decentes). No entanto, Tom e Huck t챗m suas falhas, o pior caso foi a maneira extravagante de Becky ter sido escrita, se houver uma Becky mais ego챠sta e mal-intencionada em qualquer adapta챌찾o cinematogr찼fica de Tom Sawyer que ainda esteja por vir e Rachael Leigh Cook enquanto atraente parece um adolescente for챌ado e estereotipado em sua atua챌찾o. H찼 alguns momentos divertidos injetados nos momentos mais nost찼lgicos e encantadores vistos no primeiro semestre, mas no segundo semestre, onde 챕 tudo suspense e Injun Joe no tumulto parece um filme completamente diferente, as duas metades justap천em demais. As cenas cruciais existem mesmo quando a adapta챌찾o 챕 bastante frouxa, mas o cora챌찾o est찼 ausente. A cena do funeral 챕 bastante sub-caracterizada e apressada, e a cena de "noivado" parece excessivamente sentimental (uma tentativa da Disney de tornar a hist처ria mais oportuna) e tamb챕m desajeitada. O pior trecho de di찼logo foi Becky "O qu챗? Eu n찾o sou o primeiro? Espero que voc챗 morra", n찾o s처 챕 uma coisa terr챠vel e superficial de se dizer em primeiro lugar, mas 챕 algo que Becky nunca sonharia em dizer. Grande parte do di찼logo 챕 fraco, n찾o apenas a linha de Becky, mas todo o estilo n찾o 챕 muito matizado e 횪s vezes parece moderno demais. Poucas tentativas tamb챕m s찾o feitas para trazer o dialeto do Missouri, a linguagem e a forma como eles falam, os valores da produ챌찾o fizeram um 처timo trabalho ao evoc찼-los, por que a escrita tamb챕m n찾o se esfor챌ou? E isso vem de algu챕m que faz um grande esfor챌o para julgar filmes / s챕ries de TV / adapta챌천es liter찼rias em seus pr처prios termos. Al챕m de Huck, Injun Joe e, em menor grau, Tom, o resto dos atores sofre com seus personagens serem subdesenvolvidos e n찾o se registram como resultado. Para concluir, Tom e Huck est찾o bem como um filme, embora com muitos problemas, mas junto com o filme sovi챕tico (com dublagem, ritmo e edi챌찾o ruins), 챕 uma das adapta챌천es mais fracas de um grande livro. 5/10 Bethany Cox
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: Nineteenth century Mississippi River boy Jonathan Taylor Thomas (as Tom Sawyer) tries to runaway to New Orleans with his pals, but has to abort the mission with a bloody forehead. As punishment, young Thomas is directed to whitewash a fence, by guardian Amy Wright (as Aunt Polly). Thomas cleverly gets neighborhood lads to finish the job. He shares adventures with rebellious best-friend Brad Reno (as Huckleberry "Huck" Finn) and pretty girl-friend Rachael Leigh Cook (as Becky Thatcher).While nothing to write Mark Twain about, the Disney studio's follow-up to their "The Adventures of Huck Finn" (1993) is serviceable. Both films would have (and will) be much more appealing to the elementary and primary school set, who will hopefully read the books. Strengths from the earlier version look better with a simpler music score and more appropriate leads. One wishes they had waited on the previous film to release as a sequel to this "Tom and Huck", as the original author intended.***** Tom and Huck (12/22/95) Peter Hewitt ~ Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Brad Renfro, Eric Schweig, Rachael Leigh Cook

Como puni챌찾o, o jovem Thomas 챕 instru챠do a cal챌ar uma cerca, pela guardi찾 Amy Wright (como tia Polly). Thomas habilmente recebe rapazes do bairro para terminar o trabalho. Ele compartilha aventuras com o melhor amigo rebelde Brad Reno (como Huckleberry "Huck" Finn) e a bonita namorada Rachael Leigh Cook (como Becky Thatcher). Adventures of Huck Finn "(1993) pode ser reparado. Ambos os filmes seriam (e ser찾o) muito mais atraentes para o ensino fundamental e m챕dio, que esperan챌osamente ler찾o os livros. Os pontos fortes da vers찾o anterior parecem melhores com uma partitura mais simples e pistas mais apropriadas. Desejamos que eles esperassem que o filme anterior fosse lan챌ado como uma sequ챗ncia deste "Tom e Huck", como o autor original pretendia. ***** Tom e Huck (22/12/95) Peter Hewitt ~ Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Brad Renfro, Eric Schweig, Rachael Leigh Cook
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: Tom Sawyer is a mischievous young boy, growing up in a small US town in the mid-1800s. He finds a friend in Huckleberry Finn, a vagrant and outcast, and the two get up to all sorts of boyish adventures. While on one of these adventures they witness a murder, leaving Tom with a dilemma.Based on Mark Twain's famous novel, this adaptation is hardly definitive. Produced by Disney it's clearly made for kids, with dumbed-down plot development and sub-plots and performances by the leads that are aimed strictly at children. Throw in some pretty hammy acting all round and it appears to not have much going for it.Yet it has some positives. It's a very harmless, accessible version of the book. If you've never read The Adventures of Tom Sawyer or watched any other version of the novel, it's a quick and painless introduction to the book. It's short and never dull so doesn't feel like a total waste of time. In addition, kids will enjoy it (which is great for Disney, as they are the target audience).So not a total write-off.
Resenhas: Tom Sawyer 챕 um jovem travesso, que cresceu em uma pequena cidade dos EUA em meados do s챕culo XIX. Ele encontra um amigo em Huckleberry Finn, um vagabundo e p찼ria, e os dois se envolvem em todo tipo de aventuras de menino. Enquanto em uma dessas aventuras eles testemunham um assassinato, deixando Tom com um dilema. Com base no famoso romance de Mark Twain, essa adapta챌찾o n찾o 챕 definitiva. Produzido pela Disney, 챕 claramente feito para crian챌as, com desenvolvimento de enredos embotados e sub-enredos e performances dos l챠deres que visam estritamente as crian챌as. Jogue um pouco de hammy atuando o tempo todo e parece n찾o ter muito a seu favor. No entanto, tem alguns pontos positivos. 횋 uma vers찾o acess챠vel e muito inofensiva do livro. Se voc챗 nunca leu As aventuras de Tom Sawyer ou assistiu a outra vers찾o do romance, 챕 uma introdu챌찾o r찼pida e indolor ao livro. 횋 curto e nunca mon처tono, por isso n찾o parece uma total perda de tempo. Al챕m disso, as crian챌as v찾o se divertir (o que 챕 처timo para a Disney, pois s찾o o p첬blico-alvo).
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: The story was ok, but at some point I have to say that it's allday racism of the 18xx against natives. Natives allways have to be the bad counterpart in such a story. Even black people weren't in a fix like natives. So the story might have been good for the times Mark Twain wrote them - and I rely on the studios correctness to not change the story from Mark Twain too much. I also have too admit that I never read any book of Mark Twain. But if the story goes other way, shame on the studio. Both options are bad, so I won't change my mind about my rating. Offside the racism through native stereotypes, it is a nice movie for kids, not more. I wouldn't show it to kids without teaching them about stereotypes against natives.
Resenhas: A hist처ria foi boa, mas em algum momento devo dizer que 챕 o racismo dos 18xx contra os nativos. Os nativos sempre t챗m que ser a contraparte ruim dessa hist처ria. Mesmo os negros n찾o estavam em uma situa챌찾o como os nativos. Ent찾o a hist처ria pode ter sido boa para os tempos em que Mark Twain as escreveu - e eu confio na corre챌찾o dos est첬dios para n찾o mudar muito a hist처ria de Mark Twain. Tamb챕m admito que nunca li nenhum livro de Mark Twain. Mas se a hist처ria for de outra maneira, tenha vergonha no est첬dio. Ambas as op챌천es s찾o ruins, ent찾o n찾o mudarei de id챕ia sobre minha classifica챌찾o. Fora o racismo por meio de estere처tipos nativos, 챕 um bom filme para crian챌as, n찾o mais. Eu n찾o mostraria isso para as crian챌as sem lhes ensinar sobre estere처tipos contra os nativos.
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: We all know the story. There have been some pretty good Tom Sawyer movies made. This one capitalizes on star power for an audience that probably has never heard of the principle character. Putting these motives aside, it just doesn't work the best. While Jonathan Taylor Thomas is an adequate Tom, Brad Renfro is not a very good Huck. He is too much of a pretty boy. He is much too bright, though his character tries to make him otherwise. If you've read Twain, you know that he is tremendously superstitious and has really rough edges, both mentally and physically. He is kind of whiny in this movie. Becky Thatcher looks to be about 25 years old and stands next to Tom like a giant. She pushes him around and dominates. Obviously, the director decided to make her an attractive character to young women. That's not bad, but it betrays the spirit of the period in which it was written. They should at least have looked about the same age. There are good scenes. The graveyard scene is well done. Injun Joe is threatening and murderous. The funeral scene is a disappointment. It needed to be milked a bit. Some of the peripheral characters could have been more developed. The conclusion works OK. However, it needed a dose of truth and believability to carry it through. See it, but don't expect a lot.
Resenhas: Todos n처s conhecemos a hist처ria. Houve alguns bons filmes de Tom Sawyer. Este capitaliza o poder das estrelas para um p첬blico que provavelmente nunca ouviu falar do personagem principal. Deixando de lado esses motivos, simplesmente n찾o funciona melhor. Enquanto Jonathan Taylor Thomas 챕 um Tom adequado, Brad Renfro n찾o 챕 um Huck muito bom. Ele 챕 um garoto bonito demais. Ele 챕 muito inteligente, apesar de seu personagem tentar torn찼-lo diferente. Se voc챗 leu Twain, sabe que ele 챕 tremendamente supersticioso e tem arestas realmente dif챠ceis, tanto mental quanto fisicamente. Ele 챕 meio chor찾o neste filme. Becky Thatcher parece ter cerca de 25 anos e fica ao lado de Tom como um gigante. Ela o empurra e domina. Obviamente, o diretor decidiu torn찼-la uma personagem atraente para mulheres jovens. Isso n찾o 챕 ruim, mas trai o esp챠rito do per챠odo em que foi escrito. Eles deveriam pelo menos ter a mesma idade. H찼 boas cenas. A cena do cemit챕rio 챕 bem feita. Injun Joe 챕 amea챌ador e assassino. A cena do funeral 챕 uma decep챌찾o. Precisava ser ordenhada um pouco. Alguns dos caracteres perif챕ricos poderiam ter sido mais desenvolvidos. A conclus찾o funciona bem. No entanto, precisava de uma dose de verdade e credibilidade para realiz찼-lo. Veja, mas n찾o espere muito.
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: Tom and Huck isn't a great movie, but it's a good way for kids to be introduced to the characters of Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn. Although it may be a bit intense for children under six, since the plot revolves around a murderer and his plot for revenge. And even though this movie is set in the 1840s, it has a strong 90s feel to it. Whatever happened to Jonathan Taylor Thomas?

Embora possa ser um pouco intenso para crian챌as menores de seis anos, uma vez que a trama gira em torno de um assassino e sua trama de vingan챌a. E mesmo que este filme seja ambientado na d챕cada de 1840, ele tem uma forte sensa챌찾o dos anos 90. O que aconteceu com Jonathan Taylor Thomas?
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: Tom and Huck is a 1995 movie released by Walt Disney Pictures starring Jonathan Taylor Thomas (T.V.'s "Home Improvement", "The Lion King" )and Brad Renfro. It is based from Mark Twain's Novel about two mischievous boys Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn who, after witnessing the murder of Doc Robinson, the town's undertaker by the evil, knife-throwing Injun Joe (who will remind you of Indiana Jones if you've seen it), they must sware in blood not to tell anyone. If they don't, they will remain alive and not die; but, if they do tell anyone it was Injun Joe, he will kill them. The morning after the murder was committed, Injun Joe blames the whole thing on the town drunk, Muff Potter, saying that Muff committed the murder when Tom knows it was Injun Joe. I first saw this movie when I was a kid and recently, I have viewed it over and over again because it is one of my favorite movies. It has everything a good movie (like I have stated in reviews of other movies) should have: awesome music score composed by Stephen Endelman ("The Hunt for Murrell's Map" is a theme that fits the movie perfectly) amazing climax (being set in a huge scary cave, it makes one of the best you'll ever see), and a lesson for both boys; "When a friend's in trouble, you don't run away." One of my favorite parts in the movie is when Tom says "Last week Aunt Polly whipped me for swiping a pie, but it wasn't me. Figured it was Sid." Then Huck replies "He wanted it, but I beat em' to it." Then Tom says "I ought to punch you in the nose." Huck answers "You're welcome to try." Then Tom's says "Maybe later." The only reason I didn't give the film a 10 is because the accents could have been a little bit more country. Other than that, this film was great family fun. Rating: 9/10!
Resenhas: Tom e Huck 챕 um filme de 1995 lan챌ado pela Walt Disney Pictures, estrelado por Jonathan Taylor Thomas ("Melhoramento da Casa", "The King King") e Brad Renfro. 횋 baseado no romance de Mark Twain, sobre dois meninos travessos, Tom Sawyer e Huckleberry Finn, que, depois de testemunhar o assassinato de Doc Robinson, o agente funer찼rio da cidade pelo maligno Injun Joe (que lhe lembrar찼 Indiana Jones se voc챗 visto), eles devem urinar no sangue para n찾o contar a ningu챕m. Se n찾o o fizerem, permanecer찾o vivos e n찾o morrer찾o; mas, se eles disserem a algu챕m que foi Injun Joe, ele os matar찼. Na manh찾 seguinte ao assassinato, Injun Joe culpa Muff Potter, o b챗bado da cidade, dizendo que Muff cometeu o assassinato quando Tom sabe que foi Injun Joe. Eu vi esse filme pela primeira vez quando era crian챌a e, recentemente, eu o assisti v찼rias vezes porque 챕 um dos meus filmes favoritos. Ele tem tudo o que um bom filme (como afirmei em resenhas de outros filmes) deve ter: trilha sonora incr챠vel composta por Stephen Endelman ("A Ca챌ada ao Mapa de Murrell" 챕 um tema que se encaixa perfeitamente no filme) cl챠max incr챠vel (sendo ambientado em uma enorme caverna assustadora, 챕 uma das melhores que voc챗 j찼 viu) e uma li챌찾o para os dois meninos; "Quando um amigo est찼 com problemas, voc챗 n찾o foge." Uma das minhas partes favoritas no filme 챕 quando Tom diz: "Na semana passada, tia Polly me a챌oitou por pegar uma torta, mas n찾o fui eu. Achei que era Sid". Ent찾o Huck responde: "Ele queria, mas eu venci." Ent찾o Tom diz: "Eu devo te dar um soco no nariz". Huck responde "Voc챗 pode tentar." Ent찾o Tom diz "Talvez mais tarde". A 첬nica raz찾o pela qual n찾o dei dez ao filme 챕 porque os sotaques poderiam ter sido um pouco mais country. Fora isso, este filme foi muito divertido em fam챠lia. Avalia챌찾o: 9/10!
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Reviews: I will never understand the adoration this farcical, buffoonish film receives. The worst thing about it is the screenplay, for which it won, somehow, an Oscar - but then, so did Dances with Wolves a few years earlier. The script revels in sentimental, which is not very Austen-like at all. The next worst thing is the direction, which is a kind of intrusive, perpendicular thing, always at odds with the context, seeming to struggle with Austen's nuanced and yet unadorned and direct message. It's all adornment in the end, and watching the actors plough through their lines is disconcerting, knowing so many of them are in fact decent actors. I do blame Emma Thompson, who is too old for the part and whose feeble attempts at conveying subtle and nuanced feelings end up looking mildly farcical themselves, especially the scenes where Elinor is at Marianne's bedside. They are frankly unwatchable. I think this perhaps the worst adaptation of Austen in modern times, and yet how highly it is praised. One might as well have put big red noses and huge clown feet on the actors - all that kerfuffle going on on screen and hiding an empty vision. Compared to the wonderful 2008 TV film, this 1995 film is mere buffoonery.
Resenhas: Eu nunca vou entender a adora챌찾o que esse filme f첬til e rid챠culo recebe. A pior coisa 챕 o roteiro, pelo qual ganhou, de alguma forma, um Oscar - mas tamb챕m o mesmo fez Dances with Wolves alguns anos antes. O roteiro se revela sentimental, o que n찾o 챕 muito parecido com Austen. A pior coisa a seguir 챕 a dire챌찾o, que 챕 uma esp챕cie de coisa intrusiva e perpendicular, sempre em desacordo com o contexto, parecendo lutar com a mensagem sutil e direta e sem adornos de Austen. 횋 tudo adorno no final, e assistir os atores seguirem suas linhas 챕 desconcertante, sabendo que muitos deles s찾o de fato atores decentes. Eu culpo Emma Thompson, que 챕 velha demais para o papel e cujas fracas tentativas de transmitir sentimentos sutis e sutis acabam parecendo levemente rid챠culas, especialmente as cenas em que Elinor est찼 ao lado da cama de Marianne. Eles s찾o francamente inatac찼veis. Acho que essa talvez seja a pior adapta챌찾o de Austen nos tempos modernos, e, no entanto, qu찾o altamente 챕 elogiada. Pode-se tamb챕m colocar grandes narizes vermelhos e enormes p챕s de palha챌o nos atores - toda essa confus찾o acontecendo na tela e escondendo uma vis찾o vazia. Comparado com o maravilhoso filme de TV de 2008, este filme de 1995 챕 mero buf찾o.

Reviews: I don't think that its possible to get anything out of this movie unless you are a fan of other versions of this. The acting is bad. The camerawork is flat. The dialogue is dull. NOTHING HAPPENS. This movie so boring that just thinking about it makes me want to take a nap. The audio/visual quality is so poor it made me think that the movie was much older when I watched it than it is (though that may have been the intention). Have I mentioned that nothing interesting happens? I would never recommend this movie. The only reason I would ever bring it up is to give it as an example for a boring movie.

Reviews: I have just finished reading the book and was very excited about watching the film. Looking at the cast and the received score my expectations were great to say the least. To my disappointment they were, after viewing only first half an hour, far too great for this adaptation.Although some of the cast did the job exceedingly well, the script did not allow room for them to bring their characters to life. The script deviated from the original work so much in some parts it was almost painful to watch. A masterpiece should not have to suffer for want of a running time, nor should it be rewritten for the sake of inducing a few chuckles in the viewer. I might not judge it so harshly have I not just read Jane Austen's masterpiece and am still under the impressions of her great work. In the review section I have seen nothing but praises so I must conclude the fault must be more in my own tendency towards books rather than their ecranisations and belief the work of masters should never, not even slightly, be changed.
Resenhas: Acabei de ler o livro e fiquei muito empolgado em assistir ao filme. Olhando para o elenco e a pontua챌찾o recebida, minhas expectativas foram 처timas para dizer o m챠nimo. Para minha decep챌찾o, eles foram, depois de ver apenas a primeira meia hora, grandes demais para essa adapta챌찾o. Embora parte do elenco tenha feito o trabalho extremamente bem, o roteiro n찾o permitiu que eles trouxessem vida a seus personagens. O roteiro se desviou tanto do trabalho original em algumas partes que foi quase doloroso de assistir. Uma obra-prima n찾o deve sofrer por falta de tempo de execu챌찾o, nem deve ser reescrita com o objetivo de induzir algumas risadas no espectador. Talvez eu n찾o o julgue t찾o severamente, n찾o apenas li a obra-prima de Jane Austen e ainda estou sob as impress천es de seu grande trabalho. Na se챌찾o de revis찾o, n찾o vi nada al챕m de elogios; portanto, devo concluir que a falha deve estar mais na minha pr처pria tend챗ncia para os livros do que em suas ecraniza챌천es e cren챌as de que o trabalho dos mestres nunca deve ser mudado, nem que ligeiramente.

Reviews: When I first saw this film in cinema 11 years ago, I loved it. I still think the directing and cinematography are excellent, as is the music. But it's really the script that has over the time started to bother me more and more. I find Emma Thompson's writing self-absorbed and unfaithful to the original book; she has reduced Marianne to a side-character, a second fiddle to her much too old, much too severe Elinor - she in the movie is given many sort of 'focus moments', and often they appear to be there just to show off Thompson herself.I do understand her cutting off several characters from the book, but leaving out the one scene where Willoughby in the book is redeemed? For someone who red and cherished the book long before the movie, those are the things always difficult to digest.As for the actors, I love Kate Winslet as Marianne. She is not given the best script in the world to work with but she still pulls it up gracefully, without too much sentimentality. Alan Rickman is great, a bit old perhaps, but he plays the role beautifully. And Elizabeth Spriggs, she is absolutely fantastic as always.
Resenhas: Quando vi este filme no cinema, h찼 11 anos, adorei. Ainda acho que a dire챌찾o e a cinematografia s찾o excelentes, assim como a m첬sica. Mas 챕 realmente o roteiro que, com o tempo, come챌ou a me incomodar cada vez mais. Acho a escrita de Emma Thompson auto-absorvida e infiel ao livro original; ela reduziu Marianne a um personagem secund찼rio, um segundo violino para Elinor muito velha e muito severa - ela no filme recebe muitos tipos de 'momentos de foco', e muitas vezes eles parecem estar l찼 apenas para mostrar Thompson Eu a entendo cortando v찼rios personagens do livro, mas deixando de fora a 첬nica cena em que Willoughby 챕 resgatado? Para algu챕m que amava o livro muito antes do filme, essas s찾o as coisas sempre dif챠ceis de digerir. Quanto aos atores, eu amo Kate Winslet como Marianne. Ela n찾o recebe o melhor roteiro do mundo para trabalhar, mas ainda o apresenta graciosamente, sem muito sentimentalismo. Alan Rickman 챕 처timo, talvez um pouco velho, mas ele desempenha o papel lindamente. E Elizabeth Spriggs, ela 챕 absolutamente fant찼stica, como sempre.

Hulk sabe que seu pr처prio filme 챕 meio bobo, mas de certa forma, seu pr처prio filme 챕 mais intelectual que "Sense and Sensibility" (Bruce Banner n찾o quer se transformar em Hulk, mas gosta de sentir poder) .Hulk quer falar sobre elenco membros. Kate Winslet 처tima atriz. Hulk v챗 "Brilho Eterno da Mente Sem Lembran챌as" e "Procurando Terra do Nunca", e gosta mais dela nesses filmes do que em "Titanic". Quando seu pr처ximo filme sair ?! Reviews: I should be honest that I am not crazy over British costume dramas or a huge fan of Jane Austen's classic novels. I think that also means that I would never go crazy over a film like this. Emma Thompson, who also adapted the novel to screen, plays Elinor Dashwood, the oldest sister and she represents "sense." Kate Winslet plays Marianne Dashwood, the younger sister who represents "sensibility." Their father has died and he must leave his fortune to the son of his first marriage. This causes complications between the family and the daughters' hopes of marriage.Elinor begins a relationship with a rich man, Edward Ferrars (Hugh Grant). They are then separated because of Edward's wealthy family. Marianne, on the other hand, is in love with John Willoughby (Greg Wise). At the same time, wealthy Colonel Brandon (Alan Rickman) has eyes for Marianne, but she thinks Brandon is too old for her and prefers Willoughby instead.The film sometimes has a few heartwarming and humorous moments, but overall I was quite bored of the film. The acting is pretty standard and the performances still deliver. Winslet's Marianne is who really shines in the cast. Director Ang Lee shows his versatility in her occupation perfectly 혯 the guy can make a good Taiwanese film, a British costume drama, a film based on American suburbia, a Chinese martial arts film, an action film and even a gay cowboy movie. The film is simply told, maybe being a little too long (never read the book) and might be great for fans, but I actually got bored while watching the film. The ending is predictable but yet wraps the story nicely.
Resenhas: Devo ser sincero que n찾o sou louco por dramas brit창nicos ou por um grande f찾 dos romances cl찼ssicos de Jane Austen. Eu acho que isso tamb챕m significa que eu nunca ficaria louco por um filme como esse. Emma Thompson, que tamb챕m adaptou o romance para a tela, interpreta Elinor Dashwood, a irm찾 mais velha e ela representa "senso". Kate Winslet interpreta Marianne Dashwood, a irm찾 mais nova que representa "sensibilidade". O pai deles morreu e ele deve deixar sua fortuna para o filho de seu primeiro casamento. Isso causa complica챌천es entre a fam챠lia e as esperan챌as de casamento das filhas. Elinor come챌a um relacionamento com um homem rico, Edward Ferrars (Hugh Grant). Eles s찾o separados por causa da rica fam챠lia de Edward. Marianne, por outro lado, est찼 apaixonada por John Willoughby (Greg Wise). Ao mesmo tempo, o rico coronel Brandon (Alan Rickman) tem olhos para Marianne, mas ela acha que Brandon 챕 velho demais para ela e prefere Willoughby. filme. A atua챌찾o 챕 bastante padr찾o e as performances ainda s찾o boas. Marianne, de Winslet, 챕 quem realmente brilha no elenco. A diretora Ang Lee mostra perfeitamente sua versatilidade em sua ocupa챌찾o - o cara pode fazer um bom filme de Taiwan, um drama de fantasia brit창nico, um filme baseado nos sub첬rbios americanos, um filme de artes marciais chinesas, um filme de a챌찾o e at챕 um filme de cowboy gay. O filme 챕 simplesmente contado, talvez demorando um pouco demais (nunca leia o livro) e possa ser 처timo para os f찾s, mas na verdade fiquei entediado enquanto assistia o filme. O final 챕 previs챠vel, mas ainda assim envolve bem a hist처ria.
